text: Gornji Križ () is a small settlement in the Municipality of Žužemberk in southeastern Slovenia. The municipality is included in the Southeast Slovenia Statistical Region. The entire area is part of the historical region of Lower Carniola.Žužemberk municipal site ==References== ==External links== *Gornji Križ at Geopedia Category:Populated places in the Municipality of Žužemberk
title: Gornji Križ
